Text:

Is it safe for me to update my NGX to SP1C? Is there a crack needed? Appreciate anyone who can answer this question!
Thanks, can somebody upload working last version digital aviation fokker? Existing crack not working anymore, gauges freeze after 5-10min. I saw on their forums that is anti-piracy feature

_SnakEye man I don't know how to thank you. You're my FSX god. Keep up the good work!
hi Snakeye ,i am new here,i would love to know how you proceed with installation,i know there is a crack but idon't know how to do it,thanks in advance .

1. go to C:Documents and SettingsUsernameLocal SettingsTemp
2. start the BeaverX installer
3. select a language
4. go back to the 'Temp' folder. two new directories will have been created. 
   Open the one at the bottom.
5. inside you will see two files and one folder. open that folder.
6. copy the 'ascrypt.dll' from the 'crack' folder to that folder you just opened (overwrite the existing file).
7. now proceed with the installer and leave all the registration fields open :-)
Thank you a thousand times ,rally you have been a great help ,again thank you and have a great night.
